\t\tChampions
Origin
Class
Team Builder
Drop Rates
(%1d) Demon - Attacks from Demons have a 40%% chance to burn 20 mana and return 45 to the attacker
(%1d) Demon - Attacks from Demons have a 40%% chance to burn 20 mana and return 30 to the attacker
(%1d) Demon - Attacks from Demons have a 20%% chance to burn 20 mana and return 15 to the attacker
(%1d) Dragon - Dragons take 83%% less Magic Damage
(%1d) Exile - Exile\'s gain 100%% of HP as a shield when placed adjacent to no other units
(%1d) Glacial - 25%% chance to stun on hit for 2s
(%1d) Glacial - 35%% chance to stun on hit for 2s
(%1d) Glacial - 45%% chance to stun on hit for 2s
(%1d) Robots - Robots start combat with full Mana
(%1d) Imperial - Double damage for 1 Imperial
(%1d) Imperial - Double damage for all Imperials
(%1d) Noble - +70 Armor//Magic Resist and +35 life on hit for a random ally
(%1d) Noble - +70 Armor//Magic Resist and +35 life on hit for team
(%1d) Ninja - +50%% attack damage for your Ninjas
(%1d) Ninja - +70%% attack damage for your Ninjas
(%1d) Pirate - Chance to get extra gold on PVP rounds
(%1d) Phantom - Set one enemy\'s HP to 100 at start of combat
(%1d) Wild - Wild Allies build Fury (Max 5). Each stack gives 12%% Attack Speed
(%1d) Wild - All Allies build Fury (Max 5). Each stack gives 12%% Attack Speed
(%1d) Void - Void units deal True Damage
(%1d) Yordle - Attacks on Yordles have 30%% chance to miss
(%1d) Yordle - Attacks on Yordles have 55%% chance to miss
(%1d) Assassin - +125%% crit damage for Assassins
(%1d) Assassin - +350%% crit damage for Assassins
(%1d) Blademaster - 45%% chance on hit for Blademasters to attack 1 extra time
(%1d) Blademaster- 45%% chance on hit for Blademasters to attack 2 extra times
(%1d) Blademaster- 45%% chance on hit for Blademasters to attack 4 extra times
(%1d) Brawler - +300 health to Brawlers
(%1d) Brawler - +600 health to Brawlers
(%1d) Brawler - +1000 health to Brawlers
(%1d) Elementalist - Elementalist gain double mana from attacks. \n At the start of combat, summon an Elemental
(%1d) Guardian - +50 Armor to allies that are adjacent to Guardians
(%1d) Gunslinger - 50%% chance on hit to attack 1 additional target in range
(%1d) Gunslinger - 50%% chance on hit to attack 2 additional targets in range
(%1d) Gunslinger - 50%% chance on hit to attack 3 additional targets in range
(%1d) Knight - Team blocks 15 damage from all sources
(%1d) Knight - Team blocks 30 damage from all sources
(%1d) Knight - Team blocks 55 damage from all sources
(%1d) Ranger - Every 3s, Rangers have a 25%% chance to double their attack speed for 3s
(%1d) Ranger - Every 3s, Rangers have a 65%% chance to double their attack speed for 3s
(%1d) Shapeshifter - On transform gain 60%% max HP
(%1d) Shapeshifter - On transform gain 120%% max HP
(%1d) Sorcerer - Sorcerers gain double mana from attacks. +40%% AP to all allies
(%1d) Sorcerer - Sorcerers gain double mana from attacks. +100%% AP to all allies
(%1d) Hextech - Disable enemy items for 8s within 2 hexes of the target at the start of combat
(%1d) Hextech - Disable enemy items for 8s within 1 hex of the target at the start of combat
